title: Unranked Draft for OCE
body:
Why do we not have this?

I want to practice my midlaning, because that's what I play in ranked. Yet I can't queue up as mid in unranked, because for some reason, OCE doesn't have unranked draft. 

You don't always get what you want in Blind Pick - Top and Mid are usually called first. I can play any position, but that's not why I want to play unranked, I want to practice the spots I play in ranked, and try new things out without having to lose LP if they don't work. I wouldn't care if the queue was 10 minutes if that's what it took.

Come on Riot, how hard can it be? You have it for NA.

replies.body:
Hey there,

There was a [recent post by Sephyre](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/VdoPT9GX-queue-schedule?comment=00010000) regarding the implementation of normal draft. (Quoted below)

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=VdoPT9GX,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-11T00:58:27.786+0000)
>
> Normal Draft is not likely to be opened up anytime soon. That said, we do evaluate for it, and if we grow to the point of being able to support it we would open it up.

D:

Thanks for the link c:
